Description: If set, the '-multihome' command line argument will be set to the instance's Application IP Binding. [More information](https://starrupture.just4dns.co.uk/dedicated-server/configuration-multihome). Windows only; on Linux the Application IP Binding must be 0.0.0.0
Sets whether the server or AMP should automatically select the public IP advertised for the server, or whether it should use the IP set under Server Public IP

Sets the public IP advertised for the server, if "Manual selection" is selected as the Public IP Selection Mode. Useful if the host network has multiple public IPs, or the server is behind a public proxy or VPN
